name: LD41 - MONSTER DATING SYSTEM
description:
The unfamous Monsters are back ! There is no more use in destroying the Human World, as you can now use this new Monstruous Date'n'Meet Application.
***
Guess what the game is not finished, but i had a great time with friends around and there is still some *playable* material. Use arrows and space, select a date and fight in a FF / Pokemon poor-look-alike. I wanted to hit the compo but did not had full time free working on the game.
***
Don't expect a *real* game here once again, do not expect a solid gameplay, ending ... just raw humor, few art and bad UI design XD I hope you'll like it anyway and have some fun with it.
